load_tests.notes: Locust file created and validated (syntax check passed). To run load tests: 1) Start API server (uv run invoke api), 2) Set MYENDPOINT env var, 3) Run locust command, 4) Open http://localhost:8089 in browser. The locustfile includes tasks for GET / (weight 1), GET /health (weight 3), and POST /predict (weight 5) to simulate realistic usage patterns.
